value:
Vanessa, you know you don't need
to call me commander when we're
alone. Just call me sis...

My first mission as a member of the
knights was to care for Tana. Even so,
those days were like bliss...

I'm glad to see that Vanessa and
Gilliam have also come to Askr.$k$pJust knowing they are here is enough
to feel at ease.

Frelia is known for a fish called the
Frelian snapper. If I ever have the
chance, I'd like to cook some for you.

My most important mission is to
protect Princess Tana. I will always
be at her side.

I've come with supplies, courtesy of
your friend $Nf.

Calling it a secret might be a bit
much, but proper rest and nutrition
is key to growing stronger.

No matter the battlefield, my daily
training will not betray me.
Perhaps I overdid it a little bit...

This is for me? Thank you. I will work
even harder to meet your
expectations.

I am Syrene, commander of Frelia's
third battalion of pegasus knights.
My sword is yours to command.

A person's true value is revealed
only when they are put in a difficult
situation.$k$pThat is a lesson I learned from my
sister, Vanessa.$k$pWhen our father fell ill, she gathered
nuts and berries and sold them to
the villagers to buy medicine for him.$k$pShe saved his life, and when our
mother and I could do nothing but
sob in relief, she even comforted us.$k$pShe says she respects me, but she's
the one who's truly amazing. Nothing
is too difficult for her to overcome.$k$pSo I won't give up. No matter how
proud of her I might be, I still won't
lose to my little sister.$k$pThat is how I will protect my family
and those who are precious to me.
Now!
Steel yourself!
For the honor of Frelia!
I will protect you!
Vanessa...
I am Syrene, commander of Frelia's pegasus knights.
What theâ€”is this how you entertain yourself?
I am very proud of my sister Vanessa. I only wish she were more confident.
Princess Tana has grown a great deal. I suppose I have you to thank for that as well.
When you face a difficult circumstance, your true self emerges.

To be rescued by Prince Innes was like
something out of a dream.
I promise to protect you.
Awaiting orders.
Hm...
Fortune follow us.
